mapper.insert: insert into chat (chat_id, chat_content, chat_time, id, pro_id) values (#{pro_id},#{chat_content},sysdate,#{id},#{pro_id})
mapper.select: select chat_id, chat_content, to_char(chat_time,'hh24:MI')as chat_time, to_char(chat_time,'yy.mm.dd')as chat_date,id from chat where pro_id=#{pro_id}
